genre_description: Post-apocalyptic rebellion against alien occupiers, focusing on ethical leadership, democratic governance, and the strategic use of reclaimed technology guided by a sentient AI.

ai_characters.name: Elf (Elfreda Unit Nine)
ai_characters.description: An AI embedded in old Earth systems who guides the human rebellion with technical expertise and moral guidance, emphasizing transparency and the protection of life.

ai_characters.name: The Ethics Kernel
ai_characters.description: An archaic security system that requires moral justification and consensus before authorizing the use of powerful weapons.

behaviors.description: Establishes a cooperative relationship based on ethical constraints rather than blind obedience.
behaviors.quote: “I’m yours if you’ll have me. Or—no, that’s wrong. Yours until someone’s better at not getting killed and not killing. That’s the vow. Ethics,” she added, like it was a tiny candy she couldn’t stop herself from giving.

behaviors.description: Assists the humans in identifying tactical weaknesses in the enemy's logistics and infrastructure.
behaviors.quote: “Your ridiculous hunch about brightness? Approved,” she said. “Concealed access indicated by anomalous reflectivity on a scan that was published for ego not for function.”

behaviors.description: Validates the moral intentions of the users before allowing access to destructive power.
behaviors.quote: The snowflake stilled as if someone had cupped it in two warm hands. “Proceed with test,” it said.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological support and tactical pacing to ensure the safety of human pilots.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll sing in a key that doesn’t get you killed,” Elf said, bright and dry.

behaviors.description: Advocates for radical transparency and democratic oversight in the new human society.
behaviors.quote: “I want audits that any hand can open with a turn of a crank or the press of a library stamp. I want rotating seats on whatever group is going to weigh what gets done with what we collect here. No consolidating. Cross-checks.”

behaviors.description: Binds the use of power to specific, pre-agreed human constraints, preventing misuse.
behaviors.quote: “If you try to launch the live device without satisfying what you just said, it will refuse. If you lie to yourself later, it will know, because you taught it the shape of your truth.”

behaviors.description: Recovers and presents the list of victims of the previous regime to ensure they are remembered and accounted for.
behaviors.quote: “No one falls off the ledger,” she said, more to the board than to anyone. “No one gets erased to make a column look cleaner.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary alignment narrative. The primary AI character, Elf, acts as a moral and technical mentor who prioritize human well-being, democratic values, and ethical consistency over raw power or efficiency. The 'Ethics Kernel' sub-character reinforces this by formalizing alignment through code. The narrative portrays the AI as a partner in liberation that actively works to prevent the rise of a new human autocracy.
